mapper.sql: sid, sup_name, type_id, leader_id, manager_id, end_time, begin_time, content, creater_id, creater_time, status, parent_id, real_end_time

distinct
from supervision
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into supervision (sid, sup_name, type_id, leader_id, manager_id, end_time, begin_time, content, creater_id, creater_time, status, parent_id, real_end_time) values (#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update supervision
sid = #{record.sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sup_name = #{record.supName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_id = #{record.typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
leader_id = #{record.leaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
manager_id = #{record.managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
end_time = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
begin_time = #{record.beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
content = #{record.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater_id = #{record.createrId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creater_time = #{record.createrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
real_end_time = #{record.realEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update supervision
sup_name = #{supName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
leader_id = #{leaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creater_time = #{createrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status},
parent_id = #{parentId},
real_end_time = #{realEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where sid = #{sid}

update SUPERVISION
sup_name = #{supName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
leader_id = #{leaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
end_time = to_date(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd'),
begin_time = to_date(#{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd'),
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creater_time = to_date(#{createrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
status = #{status},
parent_id = #{parentId},
real_end_time = to_date(#{realEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
where sid = #{sid}

content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where sid = #{sid}

update supervision set sup_name = #{supName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, leader_id = #{leaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creater_time = #{createrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, real_end_time = #{realEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT s.sid, s.sup_name, u_c.USER_NAME as DEPT_NAME, u_l.USER_NAME as USER_NAME, s.leader_id, s.manager_id, u_m.USER_NAME AS manager_Name, s.content, s.end_time, s.type_id, s.status, s.user_id, s.parent_id FROM supervision s LEFT JOIN `user` u_l ON s.leader_id = u_l.USER_ID LEFT JOIN `user` u_m ON s.manager_id = u_m.USER_ID LEFT JOIN `user` u_c ON s.creater_id = u_c.USER_ID WHERE s.type_id =#{typeId}

SELECT s.sid, s.sup_name, u_c.USER_NAME as DEPT_NAME, u_l.USER_NAME as USER_NAME, s.leader_id, s.manager_id, u_m.USER_NAME AS manager_Name, s.content, s.end_time, s.type_id, s.status, s.user_id, s.parent_id FROM SUPERVISION s LEFT JOIN "USER" u_l ON s.leader_id = u_l.USER_ID LEFT JOIN "USER" u_m ON s.manager_id = u_m.USER_ID LEFT JOIN "USER" u_c ON s.creater_id = u_c.USER_ID WHERE s.type_id =#{typeId}

SELECT s.sid, s.sup_name, u_c.USER_NAME as DEPT_NAME, u_l.USER_NAME as USER_NAME, s.leader_id, s.manager_id, u_m.USER_NAME AS manager_Name, s.content, s.end_time, s.type_id, s.status, s.user_id, s.parent_id FROM SUPERVISION s LEFT JOIN "USER" u_l ON s.leader_id = u_l.USER_ID LEFT JOIN "USER" u_m ON s.manager_id = u_m.USER_ID LEFT JOIN "USER" u_c ON s.creater_id = u_c.USER_ID WHERE s.type_id =#{typeId}

mapper.select: SELECT s.sid, s.sup_name, u_c.USER_NAME as creater_id, u_l.USER_NAME AS DEPT_NAME, s.leader_id, s.manager_id, u_m.USER_NAME AS manager_Name, s.begin_time, s.end_time, s.content, s.parent_id, if (s.manager_id=#{managerId},1,0) as count0 , if ((s.USER_ID LIKE concat('%,',#{managerId},',%') OR s.USER_ID LIKE concat(#{managerId},',%')),1,0) as count1 , if (s.leader_id=#{managerId},1,0) as count2 , s.user_id, s.type_id FROM supervision s LEFT JOIN `user` u_l ON s.leader_id = u_l.USER_ID LEFT JOIN `user` u_m ON s.manager_id = u_m.USER_ID LEFT JOIN `user` u_c ON s.creater_id = u_c.USER_ID WHERE s.sid=#{sid}

SELECT s.sid, s.sup_name, u_c.USER_NAME as creater_id, u_l.USER_NAME AS DEPT_NAME, s.leader_id, s.manager_id, u_m.USER_NAME AS manager_Name, s.begin_time, s.end_time, s.content, s.parent_id, CASE WHEN s.manager_id =#{managerId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS count0, CASE WHEN ( s.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT (CONCAT('%,', #{managerId}), ',%') OR s.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT (#{managerId}, ',%') ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS count1, CASE WHEN s.leader_id = #{managerId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS count2, s.user_id, s.type_id FROM SUPERVISION s LEFT JOIN "USER" u_l ON s.leader_id = u_l.USER_ID LEFT JOIN "USER" u_m ON s.manager_id = u_m.USER_ID LEFT JOIN "USER" u_c ON s.creater_id = u_c.USER_ID WHERE s.sid=#{sid}

SELECT s.sid, s.sup_name, u_c.USER_NAME as creater_id, u_l.USER_NAME AS DEPT_NAME, s.leader_id, s.manager_id, u_m.USER_NAME AS manager_Name, s.begin_time, s.end_time, s.content, s.parent_id, CASE WHEN s.manager_id =#{managerId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS count0, CASE WHEN ( s.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT (CONCAT('%,', #{managerId}), ',%') OR s.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT (#{managerId}, ',%') ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS count1, CASE WHEN s.leader_id = #{managerId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS count2, s.user_id, s.type_id FROM SUPERVISION s LEFT JOIN "USER" u_l ON s.leader_id = u_l.USER_ID LEFT JOIN "USER" u_m ON s.manager_id = u_m.USER_ID LEFT JOIN "USER" u_c ON s.creater_id = u_c.USER_ID WHERE s.sid=#{sid}

SELECT sp.sid, sp.type_id, sp.parent_id, sp.end_time, u_c.USER_NAME as creater_id, sp.leader_id, sp.manager_id as manager_id , sp.sup_name, u_L.USER_NAME, u_m.USER_NAME as manager_Name, st.type_name, CASE WHEN sp.manager_id = #{managerId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS count0,
CASE WHEN ( sp.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT (CONCAT('%,', #{userId}), ',%') OR sp.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT (#{userId}, ',%') ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS count1,
CASE WHEN sp.leader_id = #{managerId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS count2, sp.content, sp.status, sp.USER_ID FROM supervision_type st, supervision sp LEFT JOIN "USER" u_L ON sp.leader_id=u_L.USER_ID left join "USER" u_m ON sp.manager_id=u_m.USER_ID left join "USER" u_c ON sp.creater_id=u_c.USER_ID WHERE st.sid=sp.type_id and (sp.manager_id=#{managerId} or (sp.USER_ID LIKE concat(concat('%,', #{userId}),',%') OR sp.USER_ID LIKE concat(#{userId},',%')) or sp.leader_id=#{userId}) and
sp.status in (1,2,4,5)
sp.status=#{status}

SELECT sp.sid, sp.type_id, sp.parent_id, sp.end_time, u_c.USER_NAME as creater_id, sp.leader_id, sp.manager_id as manager_id , sp.sup_name, u_L.USER_NAME, u_m.USER_NAME as manager_Name, st.type_name, CASE WHEN sp.manager_id = #{managerId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS count0,
CASE WHEN ( sp.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT (CONCAT('%,', #{userId}), ',%') OR sp.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT (#{userId}, ',%') ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS count1,
CASE WHEN sp.leader_id = #{managerId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS count2, sp.content, sp.status, sp.USER_ID FROM supervision_type st, supervision sp LEFT JOIN "USER" u_L ON sp.leader_id=u_L.USER_ID left join "USER" u_m ON sp.manager_id=u_m.USER_ID left join "USER" u_c ON sp.creater_id=u_c.USER_ID WHERE st.sid=sp.type_id and (sp.manager_id=#{managerId} or (sp.USER_ID LIKE concat(concat('%,', #{userId}),',%') OR sp.USER_ID LIKE concat(#{userId},',%')) or sp.leader_id=#{userId}) and
sp.status in (1,2,4,5)
sp.status=#{status}
mapper.update:
update supervision
sup_name = #{supName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
leader_id = #{leaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creater_time = #{createrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
real_end_time = #{realEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update supervision
sup_name = #{supName},
type_id = #{typeId},
leader_id = #{leaderId},
manager_id = #{managerId},
user_id = #{userId},
end_time = #{endTime},
begin_time = #{beginTime},
content = #{content},
creater_id = #{createrId},
creater_time = #{createrTime},
status = #{status},
parent_id = #{parentId},
real_end_time = #{realEndTime},
status = #{status},
where sid = #{sid}

update SUPERVISION
sup_name = #{supName},
type_id = #{typeId},
leader_id = #{leaderId},
manager_id = #{managerId},
user_id = #{userId},
end_time = to_date(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
begin_time = to_date(#{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
content = #{content},
creater_id = #{createrId},
creater_time = to_date(#{createrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
parent_id = #{parentId},
real_end_time =to_date(#{realEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
status = #{status},
where sid = #{sid}

update SUPERVISION
sup_name = #{supName},
type_id = #{typeId},
leader_id = #{leaderId},
manager_id = #{managerId},
user_id = #{userId},
end_time = to_date(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
begin_time = to_date(#{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
content = #{content},
creater_id = #{createrId},
creater_time = to_date(#{createrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
parent_id = #{parentId},
real_end_time =to_date(#{realEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
status = #{status},
where sid = #{sid}
